thread.title: Ukrainian intel disables Russian multipurpose ship worth $60 million near Novorossiysk
thread.title_full: Ukrainian intel disables Russian multipurpose ship worth $60 million near Novorossiysk

author: Роман Мельник
title: Ukrainian intel disables Russian multipurpose ship worth $60 million near Novorossiysk
text:
Ukrainian intel disables Russian multipurpose ship worth $60 million near Novorossiysk
Ukraine's Defense Intelligence struck a Russian Black Sea Fleet warship of the MPSV07 project near Novorossiysk, according to its message on Telegram.
The vessel is a multipurpose ship that Russia commissioned in 2015 at a cost of about $60 million. Russia has four such ships in total.
The MPSV07 is equipped with diving complexes, remotely operated vehicles, side-scan sonar and electronic intelligence tools. It can be used for seabed surveys.
Intelligence operatives hit the ship with a drone, striking the bridge where navigation and communication equipment is located, the agency said. The strike destroyed the vessel's electronic intelligence gear and left it out of service pending costly repairs.
